title: Translating overseas leadership
context: Composite of senior project managers repositioning Asian leadership experience for UK hiring panels who questioned scale and relevance.
session_flow: Audited portfolio stories to surface metrics and stakeholder complexity that transfer cross-market.
Practised bilingual interview drills to land critical phrases in both English and Mandarin without diluting impact.
Rehearsed negotiation scripts for explaining regional expertise and salary expectations.
boundary_and_consent: Coachee could stop any recording or replay that felt exposing and opted out of accent modification work.
timeframe: 5 sessions across 8 weeks with async review of story drafts.
shift: They trusted their regional achievements translated and led interviews with confident framing.
outcome: Received two final-round invitations highlighting cross-market leadership as a differentiator.
disclaimer: Composite of multiple leaders; outcomes are illustrative, not promised.
